name: Northern Straits
role_in_state: Maritime gateway and reagent import hub
economy_niches: pilotage, towage and navigational rite services
culture_adjustments: Accelerated apprenticeships for pilots and rig crews
Strong shore-born pilot caste with its own rites
Tolerated smuggling culture alongside licensed trade
Practical ritualism centered on currents and fog-auguries
constraints: Heavy dependence on imported ritual reagents
Shallow channels limit largest ocean-going craft
Guild monopolies restrict new shipwright entries
notes: Strategic chokepoint for state maritime traffic
Seasonal pilotage fees spike during fog season
Salt product tailored for preserving reagents and cured fish
